WYSIWYM.model
Class Edge

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Edge
All Implemented Interfaces:
TreeComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
DTEdge, SGEdge
public abstract class Edge
extends Object
implements TreeComponent

Edge is an interface for tree edges.

Version:
1.1 20-10-2006, 1.1 20-09-2007
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Method Detail

setID

public void setID(String i)
Sets the id of this edge. Also makes sure that the edge is stored in the node's hashmap with it's id instead of it's label (which may cause problems when a node has 2 edges with the same name

Specified by:
setID in interface TreeComponent
Parameters:
i - ID

setSource

public void setSource(Node s)
               throws NameAlreadyBoundException
Sets the source to s. To remove the source node, call this with argument null.

Parameters:
s - source node
Throws:
NameAlreadyBoundException - if source already has this edge

setTarget

public void setTarget(Node t)
               throws NameAlreadyBoundException
Sets the target to t. To remove the source node, call this with argument null.

Parameters:
t - target node
Throws:
NameAlreadyBoundException - if target already has this edge
